title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, after invoking a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
OB: The bug occurs because the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC after invoking a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
EB: The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after invoking a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be ASYNC, not REQUEST.
SR: In order to fix the bug, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after invoking a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be corrected to ASYNC.
